title: Why Speed Reading Is a Myth
description: A quick, practical guide to Why Speed Reading Is a Myth.

hook.text: Speed reading courses promise 1,000 words per minute with full comprehension. Is it real?

discovery.text: Comprehension drops sharply above 600 wpm because the eye can't fixate enough to decode meaning.

climax.text: There is no hack. Reading speed is limited by the time the brain needs to understand words.

punchline.text: Read faster by knowing more, not by skipping words.
